message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our product to you. After careful consideration of its unique features and benefits, we believe it is worth $1500000 to us. We are confident that this investment will bring significant value to your business or personal endeavors. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further.

Thank you for offering your product. I appreciate the value you place on it, but given my budget constraints, I am only able to consider a purchase price not exceeding $1200000. I hope this revised offer aligns better with your considerations.
